# fortune-mongodb

This is a MongoDB adapter for [Fortune](http://github.com/daliwali/fortune).

### Usage

Install the `fortune-mongodb` package from `npm`:
```
$ npm install fortune-mongodb
```

Then configure your app to use it:
```js
var app = fortune({
  adapter: 'mongodb'
});
```
